title: conferred on me by section 103 of the Value-Added Tax Consolidation Act 2010
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Value-Added Tax (Refund of Tax)
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Value-Added Tax (Refund of Tax) 

(Charities Compensation Scheme) (Amendment) Order 2021. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 1 January 2022.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited value-added tax (refund tax) (charities compensation scheme) (amendment) order 2021 (2) order come operation 1 january 2022

title: conferred on me by section 103 of the Value-Added Tax Consolidation Act 2010
heading: 2. The Value-Added Tax (Refund of Tax) (Charities Compensation
text_raw:
2. The Value-Added Tax (Refund of Tax) (Charities Compensation 
Scheme) Order 2018 (S.I. No. 580 of 2018) is amended in Article 3(2), by the 
substitution of the following subparagraph for subparagraph (b): 

“(b) may only be made in respect of an amount of eligible tax of €500 

or more but not more than €1,000,000, and”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

16 December, 2021. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 28th December, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [713] 3
text_norm: 2 value-added tax (refund tax) (charities compensation scheme) order 2018 (s.i no 580 2018) amended article 3(2) substitution following subparagraph subparagraph (b) (b) may made respect amount eligible tax eur500 eur1 000 000  given official seal 16 december 2021 paschal donohoe minister finance notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 28th december 2021 713 3

title: conferred on me by section 103 of the Value-Added Tax Consolidation Act 2010
heading: (This note is not part of the Statutory Instrument and does not purport to be a
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Statutory Instrument and does not purport to be a 
legal interpretation.) 

This regulation amends the Value-Added Tax (Refund of Tax) (Charities 
Compensation Scheme) Order 2018 (S.I. No. 580 of 2018) to provide that from 
1 January 2022 the maximum amount which may be claimed under the scheme 
is €1 million. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [713]
